app_detail:
Descartes MacroPoint™ for Truckers is the most trusted and secure mobile app to automatically communicate arrival, departure and in-transit location data to your partners and customers in real time. Descartes MacroPoint™ for Truckers is cost-free to use and hands-free to share data, ensuring a safe and uninterrupted driving experience.

Benefits & Features
• Automatically send in-transit location data
• Reduce check calls & increase on-road performance
• Receive real-time notification of load assignments from your network
• Instant tracking connectivity to all your customers
• No additional hardware necessary
• Improve customer satisfaction

Descartes MacroPoint™ for Truckers enables location sharing and other communication with your trusted partners during active load assignments only and always over a secure connection.

To read more about our terms and privacy policy, please visit: www.MacroPoint.com/privacy-policy/

이점 및 특징
• 자동으로-교통 위치 데이터를 전송
• 확인 전화를 축소 및 온로드 성능을 향상
• 네트워크에서 실시간에게 부하 할당의 통지를받습니다
• 모든 고객에게 즉시 추적 연결
• 추가 하드웨어가 필요
• 고객 만족도 향상
 
트럭 운전사에 대한 데카르트 MacroPoint ™는 보안 연결을 통해 만 항상 활성화 부하 할당하는 동안 신뢰할 수있는 파트너와의 위치 공유 및 기타 통신 할 수 있습니다.
